mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders o LEFT JOIN baskets b ON b.bask_id = o.ord_id WHERE b.bask_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ord_description, ord_tax, ord_totalPrice, ord_date_created, ord_date_modified, ord_basket_id) VALUES(#{description}, #{tax}, #{totalPrice}, #{created}, #{modified}, ${basket.getId()})
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET ord_description = #{description}, ord_tax = #{tax}, ord_totalPrice = #{totalPrice}, ord_date_created = #{created}, ord_date_modified = #{modified}, ord_basket_id = ${basket.getId()}
